name: accessibleLabel
description: The accessible label for the avatar. Only needed in case the avatar is used alone. If not specified, the avatar will get `aria-hidden="true"`.

name: color
description: The color of the text displayed in the avatar.

name: backgroundColor
description: The background color of the avatar. If not specified, a random color will be generated based on the username.

name: src
description: The source of the image to be displayed.

name: userName
description: The user name to extract the initials from if `src` is empty.
